attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All Gurkha troops who have served in the British armed forces both past and present should be entitled to remain in the United Kingdom after service to the country .If the troops concerned were good enough to serve/fight/and die for our country ,then they sure as hell deserve the right to remain in this country which they have served so well.

rejection.details:
There is a similar petition at:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gurkha-soldiers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
